Submodules

litesoph.config module

litesoph.config.check_config(lsconfig, name)[source]
litesoph.config.config_to_dict(infile)[source]

converts configparser to dictionary object

litesoph.config.create_default_config(config, sections)[source]
litesoph.config.dict_to_config(input_dict, configfilename)[source]

converts dictionary to configfile object

litesoph.config.get_mpi_command(engine_name, configs)[source]

returns mpi command from lsconfig.

litesoph.config.get_path(name)[source]
litesoph.config.none2emptystr(input_dict)[source]
litesoph.config.read_config()[source]

Reads the lsconfig.ini file and retrun configparser.

litesoph.config.remove_empty_value(config_items)[source]
litesoph.config.set_config(config, section, key=None, value=None, list=None)[source]

updates lsconfig object and writes it to lsconfig.ini file

litesoph.config.write_config()[source]

makes a ~/.litesoph directory to store app data. and writes lsconfig.ini with guess values.
